meanings.definition: A meal eaten in the middle of the day.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy having lunch with my friends at school.
meanings.sent2: My mom packed a sandwich for my lunch today.
meanings.sent3: The lunch I had yesterday was so tasty, I wish I could eat it again!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a lunch for my soul, filling me with joy.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread made the lunch even more inviting.

meanings.sent1: Let's lunch together at the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I usually lunch at my desk during work hours.
meanings.sent3: She decided to lunch on a bench in the garden for a change.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirped happily as we lunched under the shade of the tree.
meanings.sent5: After a long morning, I was eager to lunch on the delicious meal I prepared.
